name: GRAVE SUNSET
description:
The sun is setting, but the dead are waking.

Traverse a canyon and open field as you make your way towards the castle and your last safe haven. Collect stat raisers to decrease the damage you take and increase the pain you inflict to the skeletons you encounter.

Not all the dead have risen to end your existence, as some will give you aid by showing pictures of where to go.

Can you survive this grave sunset?
